synopsis.text: He is the youngest of the three Haruba siblings, but he's not your typical child - Maro is a spirit. Despite his supernatural nature, Maro is a friendly and helpful ghost, accompanied by equally amicable monster friends. The Haruba family's story unfolds in the nostalgic backdrop of Japan, where the viewer is invited to witness the extraordinary life of this remarkable family. Prepare to be captivated by their heartwarming and unique tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
